episodes.title: Part 2: My Mother Was A Cult Leader. At Her Funeral, One Of Her Followers Put A Curse On Me.
episodes.description: HuffPost guest writer Bliss Goldstein opens up about attending the funeral for her mother — a cult leader. During the ceremony, she says one of her mother’s followers put a curse on her. “I stood there in shock.” Goldstein is working on a memoir about her mother. You can reach her at BlissGoldstein.com.

episodes.title: Part 1: My Mother Was A Cult Leader. At Her Funeral, One Of Her Followers Put A Curse On Me.
episodes.description: HuffPost guest writer Bliss Goldstein opens up about attending the funeral for her mother — a cult leader. During the ceremony, she says one of her mother’s followers put a curse on her. “As I entered the triple-wide’s room of worship, I detected a few double takes from the followers. The air became electric around me.” Goldstein is working on a memoir about her mother. You can reach her at BlissGoldstein.com.
